name: Beth
line: So dad, guess what tomorrow is...

name: Rick
line: Martin Luther King Jr.'s birthday.

name: Beth
line: No... well, it might be...

name: Rick
line: It is.

name: Beth
line: Fine, but also, tomorrow is your one year anniversary back in our lives. I'm gonna make you flying saucer-shaped pancakes.

name: Rick
line: Oh, there's no need to do that, Beth. Regular pancakes are fine.

name: Beth
line: Happy anniversary, dad!

name: Rick
line: Oh, I get it. Regular pancakes are already shaped like flying saucers. [takes bite] Mmm, I should be making you breakfast for putting up with me.

name: Jerry
line: Should be making us a whole restaurant.

name: Beth
line: Nonsense, we couldn’t be happier to have you around. I just wish I got to see more of you.

name: Rick 1
line: Rick Sanchez of Earth dimension C-137. You are under arrest for crimes against alternate Ricks by the authority of the transdimensional council of Ricks.

name: Jerry
line: Hey! What the heck?

name: Rick 1
line: Neutralise the Jerry.

name: Jerry
line: Wait, no!

name: Summer
line: Dad!

name: Beth
line: Dad!

name: Morty
line: Rick!

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Everybody relax. If I know these a-holes, and I am these a-holes, they just wanna haul me to their stupid clubhouse and waste my time with a bunch of questions. Let’s get it over with.

name: Rick 1
line: Bring his mo-[belches]-orty.

name: Morty
line: Oh, man.

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Leave my [belches] Morty out of this!

name: Rick 1
line: You lost the right to have a say in these things when you refused to join [belches] the council.

name: Beth
line: Wait, wh-wh-wh-what about Jerry?

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Will you at least unfreeze my daughter’s idiot?

name: Jerry
line: -give you anything! I have a rare antique coin collection, just don’t hurt me! [pauses] Okay, maybe not antique, but it was a limited minting. They have little R2D2s instead of George Washingtons.

name: Beth
line: Our son’s been abducted!

name: Jerry
line: You hate me for buying those coins!

name: Morty (C-137)
line: Geez, Rick! Wh-what is this place?

name: Rick (C-137)
line: The citadel of Ricks. It’s the secret headquarters for the council of Ricks.

name: Morty (C-137)
line: Council of Ricks?

name: Rick (C-137)
line: As you know, Morty, I’ve got a lotta enemies in the universe that consider my genius a threat. Galactic terrorists, a few sub-galactic dictators, most of the entire intergalactic government

name: Morty (C-137)
line: Hey, what do you know? It’s a cowboy version of me!

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Geez, you’re easy to impress. Yeah, most timelines have a Rick and most Ricks have a Morty. This place is a real who’s-who of who’s you and me.

name: Rick Salesman 1
line: Turn your boring old Morty into a hot fashion statement, with some Morty dazzlers!

name: Rick Salesman 2
line: Hey, check this out!

name: Morty Doll
line: Show me the Morty!

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Dumb.

name: Rick Salseman 3
line: ‘Scuse me, sir, is your Morty insured? You know, every year hundreds of Mortys are injured in-

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Back off! Not my cup of tea, this place.

name: Rick (C-137)
line: I say the point of being a Rick is being a-Rick.

name: Rick 1
line: Save your anti-Rick speech for the council of Ricks, terror-Rick!

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Hey, save your Rick rules for the [belches] sheep-Ricks, Rick-pig!

name: Rick 1
line: Fuck me, pal.

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Fuck you? No no no no no, fuck me!

name: Rick Council 1
line: Bring up the holograms!

name: Rick Council 1
line: Twenty-seven Ricks brutally murdered in their own timelines. An unprecedented Rick-icidal epidemic. What say you, Earth Rick C-137?

name: Rick (C-137)
line: You think I did this? Why am I the first Rick you pull in every time a Rick stubs his toe?

name: Rick Council 1
line: You [belches] have a history of non-cooperation with the council.

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Yeah, so does the scientist formerly known as Rick! Wh-wh-wh-why isn’t he here in handcuffs?

name: Rick Council 1
line: Because he’s dead too!

name: Rick crowd
line: No!

name: Rick Council 1
line: Who else would you have us question? You fit the profile. Of all the Ricks in the central finite curve, you’re the malcontent. The rogue.

name: Rick (C-137)
line: I’m the Rick. And so were the rest of you before you formed this stupid alliance. You wanted to be safe from the government so you became a stupid government. That makes every Rick here less Rick than me.

name: Rick crowd
line: (Can you believe this guy? This guy needs to get out of here, etc. Ad lib)

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Yeah, murmur it up, d-bags. Now if you’ll excuse me, I’ve got pancakes back home with syrup on top of them. They’re about to hit that critical point of syrup absorption that turns the cakes into a gross paste. And I hate to get all Andy Rooney about it, but I think we all like fluffy discs of cake with syrup on top! And I think we also like to be accused of crimes when there’s evidence! So as they say in Canada, peace oot!

name: Rick Council 1
line: Evidence? Good idea. Scan his portal gun!

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Oh, come on. Don’t look at another man’s portal gun history. We-we all go to weird places.

name: Rick Council 1
line: Yes, but it appears you alone have been going to the exact timelines and locations in which the murders occured!

name: Rick (C-137)
line: What? That’s Rick-diculous. I’m obviously being set up!

name: Rick Council 1
line: Earth Rick C-137! The council of Ricks sentences you to the machine of unspeakable doom, which swaps your conscious and unconscious minds, rendering your fantasies pointless while everything you know becomes impossible to grasp. Also every ten seconds it stabs your balls.

name: Rick (C-137)
line: I’ve heard enough.

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Run, Morty!

name: Crowd rick
line: Uh uh, not you!

name: Morty (C-137)
line: Aaaaah!

name: Armed Rick 1
line: Nooo!

name: Armed Rick 2
line: Arrrrgh! Ahhhh!

name: Armed Rick 3
line: Aaaah!

name: Armed Ricks 4 and 5
line: Oof!

name: Morty (C-137)
line: Oh! Oooh!

name: Pizza 1
line: Yeah, I’d like to order one large person with extra people please.

name: Pizza 2
line: White people. No no no no no, black people. And hispanic on half.

name: Phone 1
line: Yes, I’d like to order one large sofa chair with extra chair please.

name: Phone 2
line: High chair. No no no no no, recliner! And wheelchair on half.

name: Armed Rick 6
line: They could have gone into any one of these.

name: Armed Ricks
line: (Ugh, son of a-, aw geez, aw man, we lost him, etc. Ad lib)

name: Sofa 1
line: Yeah, I’d like to order one large phone with extra phones please.

name: Sofa 2
line: Cellphone. No no no no no, rotary! And payphone on half.

name: Rick
line: That’ll keep ‘em [belches] busy for a while.

name: Morty
line: Those guys were wrong, right? You don’t- you wouldn’t kill yourself… y-yourselves?

name: Rick
line: ‘Course not, Morty! How could that profit me? Someone out there is killing Ricks, and the council ain’t gonna stop thinking it’s me until we clear our names.

name: Rick
line: By finding the real Rick killer.

name: Morty
line: I’m scared, Rick! Maybe we should go home and stockpile weapons like that show Doomsday Preppers.

name: Rick
line: Not really my style, Morty. Besides, your home is most likely swarming with Ricks right now.

name: Rick 1
line: Alright, listen, Jerry. If Rick calls, this device is going to trace his location. You just gotta keep ‘em on the phone for thirty seconds or longer.

name: Beth
line: Who wants lemonade?

name: Rick 1
line: Oh yeah! Mmm! Oh, delicious!

name: Rick 2
line: Beth, [belches] you’re a treasure.

name: Rick 3
line: I have a Beth just like you in my [belches] reality, except you know what? She’s not as brilliant or [belches] attractive!

name: Beth
line: Aww, thank [belches] you!

name: All Ricks
line: Ohohoho! She did it! She did it!

name: Jerry
line: Uh, hello?

name: Rick (phone)
line: Hey Jerry, it’s Rick.

name: Jerry
line: Rick! Heyy. Haha, what’s- what’s up?

name: Rick (phone)
line: So listen, the heat’s on and [belches] there’s nowhere left to turn so Morty and I are just going to fly my spaceship into a black hole.

name: Jerry
line: What?

name: Rick (phone)
line: Is that cool with you, dog?

name: Jerry
line: Rick, no! Mortyyyy!

name: Rick 4
line: I got it! The call’s coming from… inside the house!

name: All Ricks
line: [laughing] (Look at his face! I can’t believe our daughter married you, too easy, etc. Ad lib)

name: Rick
line: The Ricks are probably gonna waste some time messing with Jerry. They won’t be able to help themselves. But as soon as they get bored they’ll be on to us.

name: Chair waiter
line: Phones á la clams, and phonesgetti with phoneballs. Anything else?

name: Rick
line: Yeah, more phonesticks please.

name: Phone waiter
line: Right away, sir.

name: Morty
line: You know Rick, when I first saw all those Ricks and Mortys, I thought ‘gee, that kinda devalues our bond.’ But then I realised that just means that our relationship must be pretty special to span over all those different timelines.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, it’s gotta be that way. You’re a camouflage.

name: Morty
line: Camouflage? Wh-wh-what are you talking about, Rick?

name: Rick
line: Ricks have a very distinct and traceable brainwave due to our genius. The best way to hide from an enemy’s radar is to stand near someone with complementary brainwaves that make ours invisible. See, wh-wh-when a Rick is with a Morty, the genius waves get cancelled out by the uh, [clears throat] Morty waves.

name: Morty
line: Um… because… our personalities are so different?

name: Rick
line: Oh, shit dog! My portal gun was hacked remotely Morty, obviously by the real killer to frame me. But I was able to trace the signal. Come on, let’s go!

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Uh-oh!

name: Rick 1
line: ‘Scuse me, we’ve tracked a pair of dangerous criminals to this exact location. They look exactly like us, so in order to avoid confusion I’m going to mark us each with a red X right now. That way if someone has a gun and we both tell you to shoot the other one because they’re the evil one, you’ll know who’s lying.

name: Rick 2
line: Hey, check it out!

name: Rick 1
line: Dammit!

name: Chair waiter
line: Hey, you didn’t pay your bill!

name: Rick 1
line: The red X! Red X!

name: Rick
line: Hey, it’s a good thing that space outlet had labcoats and your favourite kind of shirt in stock, huh Morty?

name: Morty
line: Yeah, Rick. I-I heard you the first time. You don’t have to keep saying it over and over and over.

name: Rick
line: Man, this place is wayyy off the grid. This guy does not wanna be found.

name: Morty
line: Well, if he’s a Rick, doesn’t he just have to stand by a Morty to hide? I mean, isn’t that what Mortys are? Human cloaking devices?

name: Rick
line: Morty, you’re making a bigger deal out of this than it is.

name: Morty
line: Oh my god, Rick, look! There’s a bunch of people strapped all over that building!

name: Rick
line: Not people, Morty. Mortys.

name: Morty (C-137)
line: Oh my god… wh-why would somebody do this? It’s horrible!

name: Rick
line: Well, one Morty’s enough to hide from the bureaucrats. But you g- you get a whole matrix of Mortys and put ‘em in agonising pain. That creates a pattern that can hide even from other Ricks, motherfucker. I fiddled with a [belches] concept like this once.

name: Rick
line: On paper, Morty, on paper! I wouldn’t do this, it’s barbaric overkill. I mean, you could accomplish the same result with like five Mortys and a jumper cable. [pauses as Morty glares at him] Which I also wouldn’t do! I’m just saying, it’s bad craftsmanship.

name: Beth
line: Coffee time!

name: All ricks
line: (Yeah! That’s what I like to hear! etc. Ad lib)

name: Jerry
line: Ugh.

name: Doofus Rick
line: Hi Jerry!

name: Jerry
line: Leave me alone, I’m working!

name: Doofus Rick
line: Oh, you are? Wh-wh-what do you do?

name: Jerry
line: Ugh. I’m- I’m in between advertising jobs.

name: Doofus Rick
line: Advertising? Wow! So, people need help figuring out what to buy and then y-you help them?

name: Jerry
line: W-well, it’s a little more complicated than that…

name: Doofus Rick
line: Well, I mean, you do it, and you seem like a guy that really has it all together!

name: Jerry
line: [Looks around for hiding Ricks] Dude, are you… wh- you’re being a dick, right?

name: Doofus Rick
line: Oh gosh, wh- I hope not! I-I-I-I wouldn’t want to offend you in any way!

name: Jerry
line: You’re really a Rick?

name: Doofus Rick
line: Ohoho! Y-of course I am! Just as much as my Morty’s a Morty!

name: Jerry
line: Hey, he looks a lot like Eric Stoltz from the movie ‘Mask.’ You know, the one with Cher in it?

name: Doofus Rick
line: That’s right, Jerry! He-he’s from a reality where everyone is Eric Stoltz mask people! He’s Eric Stoltz mask Morty! They assigned him to me because… I never had any kids of my own. But if I did, boy, I’d love ‘em  if they were as smart and as successful as you are, Jerry.

name: Rick 1
line: Hey, get a load of this! Jerry’s hanging out with doofus Rick.

name: Rick 2
line: Haha, this is perfect.

name: Doofus Rick
line: I’m not doofus Rick! I’m Rick J-19-Zeta-7!

name: Rick 1
line: Oh, is that the timeline where everybody eats poop? Jerry, you know this guy eats poop, right?

name: Doofus Rick
line: Hey! I don’t eat poop! Y-you guys are always so mean to me!

name: Rick 1 and 2
line: [laughing]

name: Doofus Rick
line: I guess it’s only fair to tell you now, Jerry… I’m the worst Rick of them all.

name: Jerry
line: According to who? Other versions of you? If I’ve learned one thing, it’s that before you get anywhere in life, you gotta stop listening to yourself.

name: Doofus Rick
line: Wow, you really are wise, Jerry. I-I guess that’s why you work in advertising!

name: Jerry
line: The fact that you feel that way makes you the best Rick of them all.

name: Morty
line: You don’t care about me at all! I’m no different than that jacket you’ve got on! Y-y-or-or your stupid portal gun! I’m just a tool! I-I’m just an object!

name: Rick
line: Hey, it’s your choice to take it personally, Morty. Now for the love of god, be quiet! The point of this is to get the drop on the guy!

name: Morty
line: You know what Rick, I’ll tell you something! I’m more than a human shield!

name: Rick
line: Yeah, that’s right! You are! You’re a perfect impenetrable sheet of human armour, Morty! Because you’re as dumb as I am smart! Which is why when I say ‘shut up’ it’s really good advice.

name: Rick
line: Great, nice work, Morty.

name: Rick
line: Urrgh.

name: Evil Rick
line: Ooh, look at you, C-137! You’re- aren’t you a tough customer?

name: Rick
line: The slow clap? Really? Kinda played out, dude.

name: Evil Rick
line: Not in this dimension it isn’t. In fact, hah, I invented it and nobody else has ever even done it here before.

name: Rick
line: Well lah-dee-dah. [slow claps]

name: Evil Rick
line: Hey, that’s mine!

name: Rick
line: I don’t like the look of that Rick, Morty. We gotta escape.

name: Morty
line: I’m not gonna help you, Rick. Y-you’re a monster.

name: Rick
line: Don’t be Rickdiculous, Morty.

name: Morty
line: W-will you stop saying that? It’s stupid.

name: Evil Rick
line: Take his Morty away.

name: Evil Morty
line: Come with me.

name: Morty
line: Yeah, gladly. Geez man, Ricks huh?

name: Morty
line: Hey man, you seem to know how this place works. Is there any way we can… shut down that grid and rescue all those Mortys out there?

name: Evil Morty
line: It would be pointless. Mortys have no chance of defeating a Rick.

name: Evil Morty
line: In here.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, yeah, looks like payday at Neverland ranch in here. Zing!

name: Lobster alien
line: Hehehehehehehehehe.

name: Rick
line: That guy got it.

name: Evil Rick
line: Ah-ah Rick, quiet. You’re missing my symphony.

name: Rick
line: Hey, I’ll take it over Mumford and Sons. Zip!

name: Lobster alien
line: Hehehehehehehehehe.

name: Rick
line: This guy is on it!

name: Evil Rick
line: He’s not laughing at your dumb jokes, Rick. That’s just a random noise it makes every ten seconds.

name: Lobster alien
line: Hehehehehehehehehe.

name: Rick
line: Awww.

name: Evil Rick
line: See, Rick, you’re not as clever as you think you are. I wanted you to find me. We’re not so [belch] different, you and I.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, duh!

name: Evil Rick
line: See this right here, Rick? I crunched the numbers, I created a spectrum of all the Ricks. I listed ‘em out from most evil to least evil. Here’s where I am. And look at right here’s where you are, Rick. This guy right here? Super weird.

name: Rick
line: I get it. So you want me to team up with you to take down the council of Ricks, right? Is that where you’re going with this? ‘Cause that’s where I’d be going.

name: Evil Rick
line: Please. I think I’m doing pretty good on my own. I’m simply going to download the contents of your brain, and then kill you.

name: Doofus Rick
line: Okay, if we add a little more titanium nitrate, and just a tad of chlorified tartrate

name: Jerry
line: It’s incredible what a gifted mind can accomplish when priorities are in order!

name: Doofus Rick
line: Well, come on, I can’t take all the credit, Jerry. It was your idea. C’mere Jerry!

name: Jerry
line: Hey, uh. C’mere, uh. I-I wanna show you something.

name: Jerry
line: Okay, look. Everybody makes fun of me for getting these, but… you’re a genius scientist, what do you think? There’s little R2D2s where the George Washingtons should be!

name: Doofus Rick
line: You know Jerry, I’m not gonna tell you that these will increase in value, or even hold their current value. The truth is… you bought ‘em ‘cause you like ‘em. They have value to you. That’s what matters.

name: Jerry
line: (tearing up) How long are you staying?

name: Doofus Rick
line: Until we find your Rick.

name: Jerry
line: (hugging doofus Rick) I found mine. I found mine.

name: Morty (C-137)
line: Help!

name: Religious Morty
line: There is no escape, my son. We will find our peace in the next world.

name: Morty (C-137)
line: So what? Y-y-y-y-you’re just going to give up?

name: Religious Morty
line: We’re giving in to the power of the One True Morty. One day he will return!

name: All religious Mortys
line: Praise the One True Morty!

name: Morty (C-137)
line: Alright Mortys, listen up! My name is Morty Smith, from Earth dimension C-137! I know you’re scared, because I’m scared, but that’s no reason to accept our fate. We’re Mortys! We’re not defined by our relationships to Rick! Our destiny is our own!

name: Morty 1
line: This sounds like something the One True Morty might say. I’m sick of being a human shield! I-I-I-I wanna be a gardener!

name: Morty 2
line: I wanna write really crazy, intense action novels!

name: Hammer Morty
line: I’m more than just a hammer!

name: Religious Morty
line: He is the one true Morty! The one true Morty!

name: All Mortys
line: Hooray!

name: Lobster alien
line: Hey, keep it down!

name: All Mortys
line: Raaaaugh!

name: Evil Rick
line: You’ve lived quite a life, Rick. It’s a real shame you’re not gonna be around to see it through.

name: Evil Rick
line: You’re crying? Over a Morty?

name: Rick
line: No, I’m just allergic to dipshits.

name: Evil Rick
line: Ugh, pathetic. We both know that if there’s any truth in the universe, it’s that Ricks don’t care about Mortys.

name: Evil Rick
line: Do your worst, you little bastards! Kill me! Do it! Do it!

name: Rick
line: Morty! Get me out of this! Come on!

name: Morty (C-137)
line: You’re lucky I’m not a Rick.

name: Rick
line: Point taken, but this is [belches] no time for arcs.

name: Rick 1
line: Yeah, hello?

name: Rick (C-137)
line: Hey, what do me and O.J. not have in common?

name: Rick 1
line: Huh? Wh-who is this?

name: Rick (C-137)
line: I found the real killer, biitch! Get over here!

name: Rick 1
line: Yo ding-dong! We’re done here. Time to go.

name: Doofus Rick
line: Well Jerry, I [belches] guess this means goodbye.

name: Jerry
line: W-w-well, does it have to? Heh, you, you look just like Rick. We could maybe… you know… get rid of him? I’m not saying kill him, necessarily, I-I’m also not saying necessarily not kill him, but-

name: Doofus Rick
line: Jerry. W-we both know it wouldn’t work. It’s time to go back to our lives. I love you, Jerry. I love ya.

name: Morty (C-137)
line: Wh-wh-what’s gonna happen to all these Mortys?

name: Council Rick 1
line: They’ll go back to their families, attend school regularly, play video games, date girls… poor little Rickless bastards.

name: Council Rick 1
line: Earth Rick C-137, the council apologises for its false accusation. And in the way of reparations for our terrible mistake, we would like to compensate you with this voucher for a free replacement Morty, in the event that [belches] your current [belches] Morty should-

name: Rick
line: Uh, guys? Not a good time. Come on, Morty, let’s hit it.

name: Morty
line: Is it time for arcs yet, Rick? I did a pretty great job back there for a human cloaking device. Saved your ass.

name: Rick
line: Alright, Morty, don’t break an arm jerking yourself off.

name: Morty
line: Man, I can’t believe you, Rick! That right there! Tha-that was a great opportunity to show a little humanity. You know? To connect with me a little?

name: Rick
line: Hey Morty, you want connection? Go be part of some stupid club like all those dumb Ricks. You know, maybe I don’t connect because I’m the Rickest Rick there is. And you know, it would [belch] go without saying that the Rickest Rick… would have the Mortyest Morty.

name: Morty
line: It would go without saying, huh?

name: Rick
line: Yeah, it would. Did you hear me say it?

name: Morty
line: Nah… (to himself) The Mortyest Morty…

name: Rick
line: Just don’t get too big for your loafers, Buster Brown. A cocky Morty could lead to some big problems. Could be a real bad thing for everybody.

name: Morty
line: Oh yeah, how’s that?

name: Rick
line: I-I-I’ll explain when you’re older.

name: Rick 1
line: What a mess…

name: Rick 2
line: Pride cometh before the fall. I guess he got what he deserved.

name: Rick 1
line: What is that?

name: Rick 2
line: Hand me the laser defibrillator.

name: Doofus Rick
line: Hey guys! Uh, c-can I help?

name: Rick 2
line: No! Go clean the toilets! Maybe you’ll make friends with some turds!

name: Rick 1
line: You make us ashamed to be ourselves!

name: Rick 1
line: My god! I’ve seen this technology before! This Rick was being controlled remotely, puppeteered by somebody else. This is the receiver!

name: Rick 2
line: Yeah, but where’s the transmitter?

name: Rick
line: Wubbalubbadubdub! Oh. Hey Jerry. Wh-wh-what are you doing in my room, buddy?

name: Jerry
line: Nothing! I was just, um, checking the smoke detectors.

name: Rick
line: Alright. Okay, get out.

name: Rick
line: What’s that dipshit doing out there? Are you friends with him? You know he eats his own shit, right? Oh my god, this is rich! I’ve got like [belches] ten Ricks to call right now!
